PrecisEnactment of the RECOVERY OF OVERPAYMENTS MADE TO FORMER MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT REGULATIONS which autorize the Minister to recover overpaid pension benefits where former Members of the House of Commons and of the Senate re-enter the federal public sector and earn in excess of $5,000 annually.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0568 Publication Date: 1997-12-24
